message.body: I'll email it to you also
Thanks. And a brain fart . . . . last name? It sucks to get old. Did you get alot of snow?
Korner We probably got 2 foot of snow it's horrible
It wasn't a fun drive in this morning. It took Michele 2 1/2 hrs to drive a 30 min drive home last nite!
We had our driveway plowed to get out to go to physical therapy yesterday and it needs to be plowed again!
